price: Wọ́n tà á ní ẹ̀dínwó pẹ̀lú owó diriham tó níye. Wọ́n kò sì wowọ́ mọ́ ọn.¹
arabic: وَشَرَوۡهُ بِثَمَنِۭ بَخۡسٖ دَرَٰهِمَ مَعۡدُودَةٖ وَكَانُواْ فِيهِ مِنَ ٱلزَّٰهِدِينَ
footnotes: 1. Ìyẹn ni pé, wọn kò tà á ní ọ̀wọ́n gógó.

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: washarawhu bithamanin bakhsin darāhima maʿdūdatin wakānū fīhi mina al-zāhidīna
